remarks: Distributive law for inner product.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dipdir.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
dipdir.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
dipdir.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
dipdi $p |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A P ( B G C ) ) = ( ( A P B ) + ( A P C ) ) ) $.
